# illuminate <img src='man/figures/logo.jpg' align="right" height="64.5" />


illuminate is designed for making the data analysis easy and less time consuming. The package is based on tidyr, dplyr, stringr packages. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mhkhan27/illuminate")

```
